channel.title: Projects on Reusing the wheel
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Reusing the wheel

item.title: Yule
item.description: a Spring-based blog engine with schedulable auto-publishing mechanism

item.title: base16-theme-switcher
item.description: A tool for setting base16 color themes for various applications, using themes from base16-xresources project. Supports applications configurable through .Xresources configuration file and provides a plugin API for adding theme-selection menu and extending support to applications that don’t use .Xresources.

item.title: Blog Engine
item.description: A blog engine application written in PHP 5.3.* and based on Symfony 2.8.*.

item.title: url-shortener
item.description: a URL shortener with spam-protection mechanisms

item.title: spam-lists
item.description: a set of tools for filtering spam URLs
